name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Catherine McKNIGHT, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Catherine McKNIGHT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Judgments of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Delaware County are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert F. Pappano, Chester, for appellant.
Frank Hazel, Dist. Atty., David E. Fritchey, Chief, Appeals Unit, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
424 A.2d 493
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Catherine McKNIGHT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 17, 1980.
Decided Jan. 27, 1981.
Robert F. Pappano, Chester, for appellant.
Frank Hazel, Dist. Atty., David E. Fritchey, Chief, Appeals Unit, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
